distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for gnutls fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-20232: Fixed a use after free issue which could have led to memory corruption and other potential consequences (bsc#1183456).
- CVE-2021-20231: Fixed a use after free issue which could have led to memory corruption and other potential consequences (bsc#1183457).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: A flaw was found in gnutls. A use after free issue in client sending key_share extension may lead to memory corruption and other consequences.
notes.title: CVE description

notes.text: A flaw was found in gnutls. A use after free issue in client_send_params in lib/ext/pre_shared_key.c may lead to memory corruption and other potential consequences.
notes.title: CVE description
